data.name: Commercial Unsecured Overdraft
data.description: Easy access to approved finance to manage everyday business expenses.

features.additionalInfo: Access up to $50K additional funds in your business transaction account.
No fixed term, pay what you can, when you can - as long as the overdraft stays under the limit.
Pay suppliers and wages when cash flow gets tight.
Approved limit: A transaction account with an approved limit and 24/7 access to available funds.
Flexible repayment options: No set repayments
24/7 access: You can access your commercial overdraft using a Business Visa Debit Card, Internet and Phone banking or in branch.
Security: There is no need to secure the overdraft against any assets. Directors' Guarantee will be required for Company borrowers.
Fixed rates are not available for the Unsecured Commercial Overdraft. Talk to your banker today for more information on applicable interest rate and fees.
Interest is calculated daily on the balance owing, and charged monthly.
Subject to terms and conditions, this product has EXTRA_REPAYMENTS option available.
Relationship management is available for eligible customers.
Lending Establishment Fee applies on contract execution.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Your business must be registered in Australia
For existing eligible St. George  customers.

A business entity domiciled in Australia or an individual 18 years and above or strata corporation domiciled in Australia and requires the funding for business or investment purposes other than investment in residential property

fees.name: Line Fees
fees.additionalInfo: A Line fee is charged monthly on the overdraft limit. This Fee is subject to negotiation. It will be set out in your Facility Offer.
